fetchBalances().details: Not a view because fetching from the oracle is state changing. Can still be accessed as a view from within the UX.

getTCR().details: Not a view because fetching from the oracle is state changing. Can still be accessed as a view from within the UX.

fetchBalances().notice: Get total collateral and debt balances for all active collaterals, as well as the current collateral prices

getTCR().notice: Get the global total collateral ratio

userdoc.notice: Based on Liquity's `BorrowerOperations` https://github.com/liquity/dev/blob/main/packages/contracts/contracts/BorrowerOperations.sol Zebra's implementation is modified to support multiple collaterals. There is a 1:n relationship between `BorrowerOperations` and each `TroveManager` / `SortedTroves` pair.
